examples: The United States doesn’t foment color revolutions.

examples: With nearly 2000 businesses in the daily deal site space alone, it's filled with legitimate businesses and plenty of Fly-By-Night sites working to rise to the top of your search results without any interest in whether that promo code actually works Because you're looking for a coupon code online.

examples: In fact, in some ways, Darwinism was accepted too easily.
Spencer’s idea, called social Darwinism, influenced a lot of people in the late 1800s.

And we saw a shift away from the social Darwinism, that sort of dog-eat-dog mind-set of the time, into what historians call the Social Gospel, which was a movement that tried to get us to think more about what we owe to each other, what responsibilities do we have to each other in a society, rather than simply the idea that a society is one giant competition.
words.defineEn: a theory of organic evolution claiming that new species arise and are perpetuated by natural selection

examples: But by 7 million years ago, this intrepid explorer had already made it as far as Spain.

examples: The historian provided the right historical context for the event.
